There are 3 elements: * Frost: Slows the target * Fire: Burns the target * Spirit: "Wallhack" the enemy for you and your team. I don't know exactly values like timing/%/damage neither if they were anounced by hirez.
The one that adcs were viable in bot lane

* She needs to land an E before doing anything * She don't have escape * You can simply stay behind your minions and avoid the E * She don't have escape * Q is pretty hard to hit without landing E first * You can predict her movement when she ults * Just abuse her E cd * Don't let she kills W minions

I do play Kennen adc a lot (as you can see in my flair) and he's actually pretty good imo. Unfortunaly those Rageblade nerfs are hitting way too hard our little adc. I do prefer something like BotRK - gt; Rageblade - gt; Stormrazor but Runaan is ok.
